languages.text: {n}Внезапно голос демонетки начинает звенеть прямо у вас в голове.{/n} "Но если ты позволишь мне подобраться к заблудшему сыну... если усыпишь его бдительность... мой Принц вознаградит тебя, {name}. Душа этого ничтожного ксеноса — невеликая плата за благословения, что сулит снисхождение моего владыки".

traits.locale_text: {n}Внезапно голос демонетки начинает звенеть прямо у вас в голове.{/n} "Но если ты позволишь мне подобраться с заблудшему сыну... если усыпишь его бдительность... мой Принц вознаградит тебя, {name}. Душа этого ничтожного ксеноса — невеликая плата за благословения, что сулит снисхождение моего владыки".
traits.speaker: DemonSlaaneshMainDaemonette_MarazhaiQ1

languages.text: {n}The Daemonette's voice suddenly forces itself inside your mind.{/n} "But if you let me get close to the lost child... if you lull him into letting his guard down... my Prince will reward you, {name}. The soul of this pathetic xenos is a small price to pay for the blessings that come with my master's favour."

Душа этого ничтожного ксеноса — невеликая плата за благословения, что сулит снисхождение моего владыки".

The soul of this pathetic xenos is a small price to pay for the blessings that come with my master's favour."

languages.text: {n}La voix de la démonette s'impose soudain dans votre esprit.{/n} « Mais si vous me laissez approcher de l'enfant perdu... si vous l'amadouez et l'amenez à baisser sa garde... mon Prince saura vous récompenser, {name}. L'âme de ce xénos pathétique est un bien modeste tribut au regard des faveurs de mon maître. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Daemonette's voice suddenly forces itself inside your mind.{/n} "But if you let me get close to the lost child... if you lull him into letting his guard down... my Prince will reward you, {name}. The soul of this pathetic xenos is a small price to pay for the blessings that come with my master's favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de la démonette s'impose soudain dans votre esprit.{/n} « Mais si vous me laissez approcher de l'enfant perdu... si vous l'amadouez et l'amenez à baisser sa garde... mon Prince saura vous récompenser, {name}. L'âme de ce xénos pathétique est un bien modeste tribut au regard des faveurs de mon maître. »
traits.speaker: DemonSlaaneshMainDaemonette_MarazhaiQ1

languages.text: {n}デモネットの声が突然、あなたの頭の中に響く。{/n}「ですが、もし迷い子の子に近づけさせてくれるのなら…もし彼の警戒心を解くことができれば…{name}、我が皇子が褒美を与えるでしょう。この哀れな異種族の魂は、主の恩恵にあずかるための小さな代償なのです」
languages.original_text: {n}The Daemonette's voice suddenly forces itself inside your mind.{/n} "But if you let me get close to the lost child... if you lull him into letting his guard down... my Prince will reward you, {name}. The soul of this pathetic xenos is a small price to pay for the blessings that come with my master's favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}デモネットの声が突然、あなたの頭の中に響く。{/n}「ですが、もし迷い子の子に近づけさせてくれるのなら…もし彼の警戒心を解くことができれば…{name}、我が皇子が褒美を与えるでしょう。この哀れな異種族の魂は、主の恩恵にあずかるための小さな代償なのです」
traits.speaker: DemonSlaaneshMainDaemonette_MarazhaiQ1

languages.text: {n}欲魔的声音突然强行钻进了你的脑海。{/n}“不过，如果你的愿意让我接近那只迷失的羔羊……如果你能说服他，让他放下警惕……我的王子一定会奖赏你，{name}。为了得到主人的恩惠，这个可怜异形的灵魂，不过只是个小小的代价。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Daemonette's voice suddenly forces itself inside your mind.{/n} "But if you let me get close to the lost child... if you lull him into letting his guard down... my Prince will reward you, {name}. The soul of this pathetic xenos is a small price to pay for the blessings that come with my master's favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}欲魔的声音突然强行钻进了你的脑海。{/n}“不过，如果你的愿意让我接近那只迷失的羔羊……如果你能说服他，让他放下警惕……我的王子一定会奖赏你，{name}。为了得到主人的恩惠，这个可怜异形的灵魂，不过只是个小小的代价。”
traits.speaker: DemonSlaaneshMainDaemonette_MarazhaiQ1

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme der Dämonette dringt plötzlich in deinen Verstand ein.{/n} "Aber wenn Ihr mich in die Nähe des verlorenen Kindes lasst ... wenn Ihr ihn dazu bringt, unvorsichtig zu werden ... wird mein Prinz Euch belohnen, {name}. Die Seele dieses erbärmlichen Xenos ist ein kleiner Preis für den Segen, den die Gunst meines Meisters mit sich bringt."
languages.original_text: {n}The Daemonette's voice suddenly forces itself inside your mind.{/n} "But if you let me get close to the lost child... if you lull him into letting his guard down... my Prince will reward you, {name}. The soul of this pathetic xenos is a small price to pay for the blessings that come with my master's favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme der Dämonette dringt plötzlich in deinen Verstand ein.{/n} "Aber wenn Ihr mich in die Nähe des verlorenen Kindes lasst ... wenn Ihr ihn dazu bringt, unvorsichtig zu werden ... wird mein Prinz Euch belohnen, {name}. Die Seele dieses erbärmlichen Xenos ist ein kleiner Preis für den Segen, den die Gunst meines Meisters mit sich bringt."
traits.speaker: DemonSlaaneshMainDaemonette_MarazhaiQ1

languages.text: {n}De pronto, la voz de la diablilla irrumpe en tu mente.{/n} «Pero si dejas que me acerque al niño perdido... si le calmas para que baje la guardia... mi Príncipe te recompensará, {name}. El alma de este patético xenos es un pequeño precio a pagar por las bendiciones que conlleva el favor de mi amo».
languages.original_text: {n}The Daemonette's voice suddenly forces itself inside your mind.{/n} "But if you let me get close to the lost child... if you lull him into letting his guard down... my Prince will reward you, {name}. The soul of this pathetic xenos is a small price to pay for the blessings that come with my master's favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}De pronto, la voz de la diablilla irrumpe en tu mente.{/n} «Pero si dejas que me acerque al niño perdido... si le calmas para que baje la guardia... mi Príncipe te recompensará, {name}. El alma de este patético xenos es un pequeño precio a pagar por las bendiciones que conlleva el favor de mi amo».
traits.speaker: DemonSlaaneshMainDaemonette_MarazhaiQ1

languages.text: {n}İblisiçe'nin sesi bir anda zihninde yankılanmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Fakat kayıp çocuğa yaklaşmama izin verirsen, gardını düşürmesini sağlarsan... Prensim seni ödüllendirir {name}. Bu zavallı zenonun ruhunun, efendimin eliyle elde edeceğin lütufların yanında lafı bile olmaz."
languages.original_text: {n}The Daemonette's voice suddenly forces itself inside your mind.{/n} "But if you let me get close to the lost child... if you lull him into letting his guard down... my Prince will reward you, {name}. The soul of this pathetic xenos is a small price to pay for the blessings that come with my master's favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}İblisiçe'nin sesi bir anda zihninin içinden gelmeye başlıyor.{/n} "Ama kayıp çocuğa yaklaşmama izin verirsen, gardını elden düşürmesini sağlarsan, Prensim seni ödüllendirecektir {name}. Bu zavallı zenonun ruhunun, efendimin lütfu sayesinde elde edeceğin kutsamaların yanında lafı bile olmaz."
traits.speaker: DemonSlaaneshMainDaemonette_MarazhaiQ1
